amendment.description: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 41 in the Congressional Record of September 3, 1997, to prohibit the use of any funds appropriated in the bill to pay for the costs of a court appointed officer to oversee a rerun election of any Teamster official.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hoekstra amendment (A036) Agreed to by recorded vote: 225 - 195 (Roll no. 399).
